steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
navigate to PAYM Phones page
I choose PayM Galaxy S9
click on the color dropdown
verify the name of the colour is next to the colour tile in CFAPhoneColour
select Lilac Purple color of the connected device
Navigate to device details page
Land on the 'Tariffs and extra' page
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £15 when BSC is Enabled
I Land on the basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button
input TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR to click and collect
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Not Not with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details for Click and collect order and click 'Continue on next step' for payments
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 01_CFA_NewConnection_PAYM_Phone_GDPR_Enabled_Refresh_CC_EndUser_MP_B1
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYM Phone' and lands on delivery page
then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should see GDPR consent and placed
an order by opting of Marketing preference 'B1', with CC then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
navigate to PAYM Tablets page
Select PayM Tablet iPad Pro 10.5 inch
Navigate to device details page
Land on the 'Tariffs and extra' page
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £15 when BSC is Enabled
Choose some Accesssory
I Land on the basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button
input TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step'
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 02_CFA_NewConnection_PAYM_Tablet_With_Accessory_GDPR_Enabled_Refresh_HomeDelivery_EndUser_MP_OptIn_All
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYM Tablet' and any accessories with home
delivery option and lands on delivery page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer
should see GDPR consent and placed an order by opting of Marketing preference 'All', then the Order consent profile should
be created in CMT as expected

steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
Navigate to PayM MBB page
I choose MBB PayM Random Device
Navigate to device details page
Land on the 'Tariffs and extra' page
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap DontCapMyBill Nill when BSC is Enabled
I Land on the basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button
input TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the payment page and verify copy text message below home address
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step'
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 03_CFA_NewConnection_PAYM_MBB_GDPR_Enabled_Refresh_HomeDelivery_EndUser_MP_OptIn_B2B3
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYM MBB' device with home delivery option
and lands on delivery page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should see
GDPR consent  and placed an order by opting of Marketing preference 'B2, B3', then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

navigate to PAYM SIMO page
Click on different 12 Months  Months Tariff in Tab

click on "go to checkout" button
input TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Not Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step' for SimOnly
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid cucumber024@o2.com and test123 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA
Click on Tablet section in upgrade options page
Click on View all Tablets link in upgrade options page
Select PayM Tablet iPad 9.7 inch 2018
click on the color dropdown
verify the name of the colour is next to the colour tile in CFAPhoneColour
select Space Grey color of the connected device
select 32GB capacity of the connected device
Navigate to device details page
Land on the 'Tariffs and extra' page
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £60 when BSC is Enabled
I Land on the basket page by clicking on Add to Basket button
click on "go to checkout" button
perform enterCode in OTAC page
Enter details in Delivery page for Click and collect
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
Enter cardDetails in payment page input TEST ACCEPTA and click 'Continue on next step'
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 14_CFU_Tablets_GDPR_Enabled_CC_EndUser_Complaint_MP_OptIn_B1B2B3
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the upgrade customer with complaint consent status selects 'PAYM Tablet' and lands on
delivery page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should see GDPR consent
and select MP OptIn - B1B2B3 and place an order as an CC End user then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA

perform enterCode in OTAC page

elements.name: Successful completion of a PAY M Acquistion journey by CCA settlement

steps.name: I login to Agent shop
performs Acquisition for New user
Select a valid PayM iPhone 7 Plus 32GB Rose Gold
Select valid Refresh from tariffs tab
select a valid Handset and Tariff combination_new
Validate Bill Spend Cap in agent deal builder section when BSC is Enabled
Add your Bill Spend Cap £60 in agent deal builder when BSC is Enabled
Validate all the Basket content and checkout
Validate deal summary for applied Bill Spend Cap £60 when BSC is Enabled
perform all the advisory checks
perform the credit checks using valid TEST, ACCEPTA, 14, SL11UP and valid TEST ACCEPTA
Register customer with valid test123, test123, vinudeep in delivery page
validate register status
Choose Business preferences Not Not Not Not and Channel Preferences Not Not Not Not for Someone when GDPR Enabled Connected Phone for AFA journey
Choose HomeDelivery delivery address and delivery time
Click on 'Generate CCA' button
click on the 'CCA' link
Signin using valid ink_jun8829@stf.ref.o2.co.uk and test123 credentials for New User
Click on 'Continue' button on upgrade page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Not Not with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Disabled and Yes
land on the payment page and input details and click 'Continue on next step' in upgrade journey for CCA Link
Continue to CCA or Buyout or Trade In Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks for SECCI and CCA not accepted
Continue to Review page, check order contract text and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not
